channel.title: CVE Feed for Prism IT Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Prism IT Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31122|2024-08-02T01:46:04.671Z -- prism%20it%20systems -- user%20rights%20access%20manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Prism IT Systems User Rights Access Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects User Rights Access Manager: from n/a through 1.1.2.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Prism IT Systems User Rights Access Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects User Rights Access Manager: from n/a through 1.1.2.
